changeSet.author: clarissa
changeSet.comment: Assign project.created_by = admin user id for nursery, trial templates. Jira IBP-1655

changeSet.author: clarissa

preConditions.sqlCheck: select case when ('ibdbv2_bean_merged' = DATABASE()) then 1 else 0 end from dual;

changeSet.comment: Apply fix on bean template and reduce the number of traits.

changeSet.author: vanina

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM information_schema.REFERENTIAL_CONSTRAINTS where DELETE_RULE = 'CASCADE' AND table_name = 'projectprop' AND CONSTRAINT_NAME = 'projectprop_2_fk2';

changeSet.comment: Remove cascade on projectprop_2_fk2
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE projectprop DROP FOREIGN KEY projectprop_2_fk2; ALTER TABLE projectprop ADD CONSTRAINT projectprop_2_fk2 FOREIGN KEY (type_id) REFERENCES cvterm (cvterm_id) ON DELETE NO ACTION;

changeSet.author: cuenyad

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM listnms WHERE listtype in ('TRIAL','NURSERY');

changeSet.comment: update in listnms table the listtype with TRIAL or NURSERY by STUDY
changeSet.sql: update listnms set listtype='STUDY' where listtype in ('TRIAL','NURSERY');

changeSet.author: vanina

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'project' AND CONSTRAINT_NAME = 'study_type_fk' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();

changeSet.comment: Remove study_type_fk from project table
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE project DROP FOREIGN KEY study_type_fk;

changeSet.author: vanina

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.STATISTICS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'project' AND INDEX_NAME = 'study_type_fk_idx';

changeSet.comment: Remove study_type_fk_idx from project table
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE project DROP INDEX study_type_fk_idx;

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from cvterm where cvterm_id = 10169;

changeSet.comment: Create entry list order experimental design

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM project p INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM projectprop) pp ON p.project_id = pp.project_id INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id WHERE variable_id = 8135 AND (value = '' or value IS NULL) AND st.name = 'N';

changeSet.comment: Update projectprop table where experimental design is empty
changeSet.sql: UPDATE projectprop SET value = 10169 WHERE projectprop_id IN (SELECT pp.projectprop_id FROM project p INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM projectprop) pp ON p.project_id = pp.project_id INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id WHERE variable_id = 8135 AND (value = '' or value IS NULL) AND st.name = 'N');

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM project p INNER JOIN projectprop pp ON pp.project_id = p.project_id INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id WHERE pp.variable_id = 8160 AND pp.value = 10080 AND st.name = 'N' AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM projectprop PROP WHERE PROP.project_id = P.PROJECT_ID AND PROP.variable_id = 8135);

changeSet.comment: Insert into projectprop table where experimental design does not exist
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO projectprop (PROJECT_ID, TYPE_ID, VALUE, RANK, VARIABLE_ID, ALIAS) SELECT P.PROJECT_ID, 1806, NULL, (SELECT IF(MAX(ppR.rank) IS NULL, 1, MAX(ppR.rank) + 1) FROM projectprop ppR WHERE p.project_id = ppR.project_id), 8135, 'EXPT_DESIGN' FROM project p INNER JOIN projectprop pp ON pp.project_id = p.project_id INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id WHERE pp.variable_id = 8160 AND pp.value = 10080 AND st.name = 'N' AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM projectprop PROP WHERE PROP.project_id = P.PROJECT_ID AND PROP.variable_id = 8135);

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: select count(*) FROM project p INNER JOIN projectprop pp ON p.project_id = pp.project_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment_project nep ON nep.project_id = p.project_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment e ON e.nd_experiment_id = nep.nd_experiment_id INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id INNER JOIN nd_geolocationprop geo ON geo.nd_geolocation_id = e.nd_geolocation_id WHERE st.name = 'N' AND geo.type_id = 8135 AND (geo.value = '' OR geo.value IS NULL);

changeSet.comment: Update nd_geolocationprop table where experimental design is empty
changeSet.sql: UPDATE nd_geolocationprop SET VALUE = 10169 WHERE nd_geolocationprop IN (SELECT geo.nd_geolocation_id FROM project p INNER JOIN projectprop pp ON p.project_id = pp.project_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment_project nep ON nep.project_id = p.project_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment e ON e.nd_experiment_id = nep.nd_experiment_id INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM nd_geolocationprop) geo ON geo.nd_geolocation_id = e.nd_geolocation_id WHERE st.name = 'N' AND geo.type_id = 8135 AND (geo.value = '' OR geo.value IS NULL));

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) from cvtermprop where value = 'Nursery Condition' and cvtermprop_id in (SELECT cvtermprop_id FROM cvterm cvt INNER JOIN (select * from cvtermprop) cvtp ON cvt.cvterm_id = cvtp.cvterm_id WHERE cvt.cv_id = 1040 -- variable AND cvtp.type_id = 1800 -- variable type AND cvtp.value IN ( 'Nursery Condition' , 'Trial Condition' ) group by cvt.cvterm_id having count(1) = 2);

changeSet.comment: Remove 'Nursery Condition' from variables that are have both trial and nursery conditions
changeSet.sql: delete from cvtermprop where value = 'Nursery Condition' and cvtermprop_id in (SELECT cvtermprop_id FROM cvterm cvt INNER JOIN (select * from cvtermprop) cvtp ON cvt.cvterm_id = cvtp.cvterm_id WHERE cvt.cv_id = 1040 -- variable AND cvtp.type_id = 1800 -- variable type AND cvtp.value IN ( 'Nursery Condition' , 'Trial Condition' ) group by cvt.cvterm_id having count(1) = 2);

changeSet.author: vanina

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cvterm WHERE cvterm_id = 1802 AND name = 'Trial Condition';

changeSet.comment: Transform 'Trial Condition' cvterm to 'Study Condition'
changeSet.sql: UPDATE cvterm SET name = 'Study Condition', definition = 'Observations made of conditions in a study' WHERE cvterm_id = 1802;

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM projectprop WHERE type_id = 1803;

changeSet.comment: Change 'Nursery Condition' props to 'Study Condition'
changeSet.sql: UPDATE projectprop SET type_id=1802 WHERE type_id=1803;

changeSet.author: vanina

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cvterm WHERE cvterm_id = 1803;

changeSet.comment: deletes 'Nursery Condition' cvterm
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM cvterm WHERE cvterm_id= 1803;

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cvtermprop where value = 'Nursery Condition' or value = 'Trial Condition';

changeSet.comment: Update cvtermprop Nursery and Trial conditions to Study Condition
changeSet.sql: update cvtermprop set value = 'Study Condition' where value = 'Nursery Condition' or value = 'Trial Condition';

changeSet.author: clarysabel

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM projectprop where alias != 'TRIAL_INSTANCE' and variable_id = 8170;

changeSet.comment: Update projectprop table where TRIAL INSTANCE alias is not trial instance
changeSet.sql: update projectprop set alias = 'TRIAL_INSTANCE' where variable_id = 8170 and alias != 'TRIAL_INSTANCE';

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: select count(1) from project p inner join nd_experiment_project nep on (nep.project_id = p.project_id) inner join nd_experiment e on (e.nd_experiment_id = nep.nd_experiment_id) inner join study_type st on p.study_type_id = st.study_type_id where not exists(select 1 from nd_geolocationprop ngp where ngp.nd_geolocation_id = e.nd_geolocation_id and ngp.type_id = 8135) and st.name = 'N';

changeSet.comment: Insert into nd_geolocationprop table missing experimental design row
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO nd_geolocationprop (nd_geolocation_id, type_id, value, rank) SELECT DISTINCT e.nd_geolocation_id, 8135, 10169, (SELECT IF(MAX(ngp.rank) IS NULL, 1, MAX(ngp.rank) + 1) FROM nd_geolocationprop ngp WHERE ngp.nd_geolocation_id = e.nd_geolocation_id) FROM project p INNER JOIN nd_experiment_project nep ON (nep.project_id = p.project_id) INNER JOIN nd_experiment e ON (e.nd_experiment_id = nep.nd_experiment_id) INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM nd_geolocationprop ngp WHERE ngp.nd_geolocation_id = e.nd_geolocation_id AND ngp.type_id = 8135) AND st.name = 'N';

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM project p INNER JOIN projectprop pp ON p.project_id = pp.project_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment_project nep ON nep.project_id = p.project_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment e ON e.nd_experiment_id = nep.nd_experiment_id INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id WHERE pp.variable_id = 8411 AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM nd_geolocationprop ngp WHERE ngp.nd_geolocation_id = e.nd_geolocation_id AND ngp.type_id = 8411) AND st.name = 'N';

changeSet.comment: Insert into nd_geolocationprop table missing check start row
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO nd_geolocationprop (nd_geolocation_id, type_id, value, rank) SELECT e.nd_geolocation_id, pp.variable_id, pp.value, pp.rank FROM project p INNER JOIN projectprop pp ON p.project_id = pp.project_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment_project nep ON nep.project_id = p.project_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment e ON e.nd_experiment_id = nep.nd_experiment_id INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id WHERE pp.variable_id = 8411 AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM nd_geolocationprop ngp WHERE ngp.nd_geolocation_id = e.nd_geolocation_id AND ngp.type_id = 8411) AND st.name = 'N';

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM project p INNER JOIN projectprop pp ON p.project_id = pp.project_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment_project nep ON (nep.project_id = p.project_id) INNER JOIN nd_experiment e ON (e.nd_experiment_id = nep.nd_experiment_id) INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id WHERE pp.variable_id = 8412 AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM nd_geolocationprop ngp WHERE ngp.nd_geolocation_id = e.nd_geolocation_id AND ngp.type_id = 8412) AND st.name = 'N';

changeSet.comment: Insert into nd_geolocationprop table missing check interval row
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO nd_geolocationprop (nd_geolocation_id, type_id, value, rank) SELECT e.nd_geolocation_id, pp.variable_id, pp.value, pp.rank FROM project p INNER JOIN projectprop pp ON p.project_id = pp.project_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment_project nep ON (nep.project_id = p.project_id) INNER JOIN nd_experiment e ON (e.nd_experiment_id = nep.nd_experiment_id) INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id WHERE pp.variable_id = 8412 AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM nd_geolocationprop ngp WHERE ngp.nd_geolocation_id = e.nd_geolocation_id AND ngp.type_id = 8412) AND st.name = 'N';

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM project p INNER JOIN projectprop pp ON p.project_id = pp.project_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment_project nep ON (nep.project_id = p.project_id) INNER JOIN nd_experiment e ON (e.nd_experiment_id = nep.nd_experiment_id) INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id WHERE pp.variable_id = 8413 AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM nd_geolocationprop ngp WHERE ngp.nd_geolocation_id = e.nd_geolocation_id AND ngp.type_id = 8413) AND st.name = 'N';

changeSet.comment: Insert into nd_geolocationprop table missing check plan row
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO nd_geolocationprop (nd_geolocation_id, type_id, value, rank) SELECT e.nd_geolocation_id, pp.variable_id, pp.value, pp.rank FROM project p INNER JOIN projectprop pp ON p.project_id = pp.project_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment_project nep ON (nep.project_id = p.project_id) INNER JOIN nd_experiment e ON (e.nd_experiment_id = nep.nd_experiment_id) INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id WHERE pp.variable_id = 8413 AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM nd_geolocationprop ngp WHERE ngp.nd_geolocation_id = e.nd_geolocation_id AND ngp.type_id = 8413) AND st.name = 'N';

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM projectprop pp INNER JOIN project p ON pp.project_id = p.project_id INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id WHERE pp.variable_id = 8255 AND alias != 'ENTRY_TYPE' AND st.name = 'N';

changeSet.comment: Update projectprop table missing entry type alias
changeSet.sql: UPDATE projectprop SET alias = 'ENTRY_TYPE' WHERE projectprop_id IN (SELECT pp.projectprop_id FROM (SELECT * FROM projectprop) pp INNER JOIN project p ON pp.project_id = p.project_id INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id WHERE pp.variable_id = 8255 AND alias != 'ENTRY_TYPE' AND st.name = 'N');

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM project p INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id INNER JOIN projectprop prop ON p.project_id = prop.project_id WHERE prop.variable_id = 8160 AND prop.value = 10090 AND st.name = 'N' AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM projectprop pp WHERE p.project_id = pp.project_id AND pp.variable_id = 8255);

changeSet.comment: Insert into projectprop table missing entry type row
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO projectprop (project_id, type_id, value, rank, variable_id, alias) SELECT p.project_id, 1804, NULL, (SELECT IF(MAX(pp.rank) IS NULL, 1, MAX(pp.rank) + 1) FROM projectprop pp WHERE p.project_id = pp.project_id), 8255, 'ENTRY_TYPE' FROM project p INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id INNER JOIN projectprop prop on p.project_id = prop.project_id WHERE prop.variable_id = 8160 AND prop.value = 10090 AND st.name = 'N' AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM projectprop pp WHERE p.project_id = pp.project_id AND pp.variable_id = 8255);

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM project p INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment_project nep ON nep.project_id = p.project_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment ne ON nep.nd_experiment_id = ne.nd_experiment_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment_stock nes ON nes.nd_experiment_id = ne.nd_experiment_id INNER JOIN stock s ON s.stock_id = nes.stock_id INNER JOIN projectprop prop ON p.project_id = prop.project_id WHERE prop.variable_id = 8160 AND prop.value = 10090 AND st.name = 'N' AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM stockprop sp WHERE s.stock_id = sp.stock_id AND sp.type_id = 8255);

changeSet.comment: Insert into stockprop table missing entry type row
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO stockprop (stock_id, type_id, value, rank) SELECT DISTINCT s.stock_id, 8255, 10170, (SELECT IF(MAX(sp.rank) IS NULL, 1, MAX(sp.rank) + 1) FROM stockprop sp WHERE s.stock_id = sp.stock_id) FROM project p INNER JOIN project_relationship r ON p.project_id = r.subject_project_id INNER JOIN project p2 ON r.object_project_id = p2.project_id INNER JOIN study_type st ON p2.study_type_id = st.study_type_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment_project nep ON nep.project_id = p.project_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment ne ON nep.nd_experiment_id = ne.nd_experiment_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment_stock nes ON nes.nd_experiment_id = ne.nd_experiment_id INNER JOIN stock s ON s.stock_id = nes.stock_id INNER JOIN projectprop prop on p.project_id = prop.project_id WHERE prop.variable_id = 8160 AND prop.value = 10090 AND st.name = 'N' AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM stockprop sp WHERE s.stock_id = sp.stock_id AND sp.type_id = 8255);
